verbose_text: ChR2 stimulation elicited excitatory postsynaptic potentials in all dLGN (n = 7), vLGN (n = 2), and PBG (n = 3) neurons recorded (n = 3 mice); these responses were blocked by the glutamate receptor antagonists NBQX and AP5 (XREF_FIG).
evidence: ChR2 stimulation elicited excitatory postsynaptic potentials in all dLGN (n = 7), vLGN (n = 2), and PBG
